title: Add mapping functionality back to the dashboard
description: Restore and implement mapping functionality for the multi-region PostgreSQL dashboard. This should include: 1) Geographic visualization of database locations across different regions, 2) Interactive map showing database performance metrics by location, 3) Regional latency visualization with connections between databases, 4) Real-time status indicators on the map, 5) Support for different cloud providers and regions, 6) Integration with existing database monitoring data. The map should provide an intuitive way to understand the geographic distribution and performance of the multi-region database infrastructure.

title: Implement secure database connection management system
description: Create a system to allow users to connect and manage multiple databases in the dashboard. This should include: 1) A secure interface to add/remove database connections, 2) Authentication/authorization for database access, 3) Configuration storage (encrypted credentials), 4) Database connection testing and validation, 5) A management UI for the database list. The system should support multiple PostgreSQL databases from different regions/cloud providers while maintaining security best practices.
